Room.Name: Mirrored Hall
Room.ShortDescription: You appear to have ventured into another room inside this vast mirrored wasteland. You can barely make out the room to the north but as you venture further south, the north room seems to blend into the south one.
Room.LongDescription: Upon considering how good life has been to you so far, you stop to rest along one of the mirrors you've bumped into. Bones lie scattered about this room (but strangely, not in the north room). Another note lies on the floor that you almost overlook. It says: "What to do if you encounter the ravenous beast of Traal. Wrap your head with a towel, being sure to cover your eyes. The beast of Traal is so stupid that it thinks that if you can't see it, it can't see you and goes about it's business. Since you left your towel behind, your other option is to run away, terribly fast." You continue to bang your head against the crystal wall.
